targets.query: select mean_value from (SELECT mean("HeartRate") as mean_value FROM "HeartRateIntraday" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m) fill(null)) where mean_value <= 96
select mean_value from (SELECT mean("HeartRate") as mean_value FROM "HeartRateIntraday" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m) fill(null)) where mean_value > 96
select mean_value from (SELECT mean("HeartRate") as mean_value FROM "HeartRateIntraday" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m) fill(null)) where mean_value < 60
select mean_value from (SELECT mean("HeartRate") as mean_value FROM "HeartRateIntraday" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m) fill(null)) where mean_value > 110
SELECT moving_average(mean("value"), 6) FROM "HeartRate_Intraday" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
